column2: Twisted Rune
twisted_rune

The Twisted Rune is a cabal of liches and other powerful undead spellcasters. The inner circle is highly secretive, and employs agents to do their bidding, most of whom are unaware that they work for the Rune. By 1018 DR, the Rune had become the most powerful organization in southwestern Faerûn, with agents in every country south of the High Moor and west of the Storm Horn Mountains.
The Twisted Rune's top level is the senior Runemasters' Council.
